name: SHOCK (Ossi)
description:
Theme: "Start With Nothing"

Grab your Sparks and make it through each level avoiding dangerous electricity!

Controls: Mouse-Only! Click to select and deselect your Power Core and Sparks, then move your mouse around to guide them!

If you've participated in Ludum Dare 45 and want to vote check out the main page here!

Software Used: Unity 2018.4.4f1 and Pyxel Edit

There might be some bugs!

Made in 48-hours for Ludum Dare 45!
